description: "A map of Groot-Atjeh, Lepoeng and Lehoeng, at the northern tip of Sumatra, detailing routes (rivers, roads, railways), crops (rice, banana, sugarcane, betel, pepper, alang-alang, bamboo) and land features (forests, mountains, wetlands)."
title: "Kaart van het gebied bezet in Groot-Atjeh met de nederzettingen Lepoeng en Lehoeng"
